body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Bruce Taylor and I represent Luxe Hotels. May I kindly ask for your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kelly. Can you please confirm your email address for account verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kelly. Additionally, could you provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's the fifth of May, nineteen eighty-seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Kelly. Is there any particular reason for your recent contact regarding privacy concerns at our hotel?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I had some worries about unauthorized access to my personal data, but your explanations have relieved me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Kelly. Thank you for your understanding and patience. If you have any further questions or issues, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. Thank you for your time today.
